name: Sarvente's Mid-Fight Masses [FULL WEEK+]
description:
I am NOT the creator of this mod, I'm just reuploading the mod on the behalf of the creator. The reupload is the latest version of the mod before deletion. P.S, the program is only for Windows. If you're a mac user, use Wineskin to play the mod. And i'm NOT accepting donations, because I DO NOT want to make money out of a mod that wasn't made by me. P.S, To all the Twitter crybabies... DON'T GET BLOCKED! :D

Credits:

Dokki.doodlez (Artwork and Animation)

Mike Geno (Music and Charting)

Kuroao Anomal (Programming, Charting, and Animation)
